akn:section.akn:heading: Office of the Chief of Naval Operations: general duties

akn:content.akn:p: (a) The Office of the Chief of Naval Operations shall furnish professional assistance to the Secretary, the Under Secretary, and the Assistant Secretaries of the Navy and to the Chief of Naval Operations.
